subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Devils backup goalie Kevin Weekes will miss two to three weeks with what the team called a lower-body injury. The team president, Lou Lamoriello, said Weekes’s injury was not expected to be serious, though the team was still awaiting test results. Weekes was hurt in the Devils’ 5-4 overtime victory against Tampa Bay on Friday, when Evgeny Artyukin’s shot struck the goalie’s left leg.
